## Objective
What do you want to change?

## Scope
- Stack(s):

- Environment(s):

## Proposed approach
Describe the preferred implementation.

- [ ] Criterion 1
- [ ] Criterion 2

## Risks
Describe known risks and constraints.

## Rollout plan
Describe deployment order and validation steps.
